main.name: Scott Mathison
main.description: I help customers find success with technical solutions in the streaming media space
main.bio: Accomplished technology leader with 7+ years of experience working for digital technology vendors, with a recent focus on streaming video. Passionate about creating delightful customer experiences and solving business challenges with technology. Roles that I have worked in include sales engineering, account management, solutions architecture, professional services, business development, and team building. Consistently recognized as a top performer in deadline-driven, fast-paced, and high-growth environments.

testimonials.text: Scott is a top-notch individual and technology leader. His deep knowledge of tech and his ability to understand and navigate the cultural nuances of the Asia region make him an asset to anyone fortunate to work with him. During our time together, Scott was a key player during all pre-sales efforts in the Asia region and his contribution to ensuring customer satisfaction was immense. Customer and prospects love Scott. He is always good natured and unflappable in the face of stress. I'd be happy to work with Scott again!
testimonials.user: Paolo Cuttorelli | VP & GM, Asia Pacific at Evergent

testimonials.text: Scott is world-class. He possesses both the technical acumen at Solutions Architecture level as well commercial acumen to understand how a cloud business runs to be successful. With an enviable level of calm in his toolbox, he brings a substantial amount of clarity and level-headedness to any situation. Scott reads every situation perfectly to deliver the right message, carefully crafted and always with a smile. He has a tireless work ethic and coupled with his Asia experience, is able to relate to the multiple cultures and disciplines encountered daily. A key anchor to any team, I would strongly recommend Scott as a high-caliber individual with both broad and deep experience.
testimonials.user: Ben Morrell | Director, Asia Pacific at Encoding.com

testimonials.text: Scott is a perfect blend of technical expertise & business acumen along with strong communication and analytical skills. In his role as lead Solutions Engineer and then as Head of Account Management, Brightcove Asia & India, Scott executed and led pre-sales & post-sales activities with tremendous success, robust leadership and a humility that makes him stand out from the crowd. A total team player with an inherent ability to blend with a diverse workforce, Scott is a tremendous asset to any organization!
testimonials.user: Vinit Mehta | Head of India at Brightcove
